tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    packet_size INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  device_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    traffic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE threat_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level VARCHAR(10),
    analysis_result TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
